quizzes.name: Onboarding
quizzes.description: Alright, let's get you all set up and ready to rock your career goals! We're going to gather some info from you, so we can give you the best guidance possible. If a question doesn't feel relevant to you or you'd rather come back to it later, no worries - just skip and we'll move on. Let's do this thing!

questions.prompt: How can we contact you? Email, phone, or text?
What's your main goal for using our website?
Would you be interested in being a mentor for someone else?
If you are interested in finding a mentor, what are you looking for in a mentorship?
choices: I am not seeking a mentor

questions.prompt: What's the industry or field you're interested in?
What's your current job title or role?
How do you work best? (For example, do you prefer working independently or in a team?)
Describe your ideal job (role, salary, location, etc.) in a few sentences.
